mapper.insert: INSERT INTO itemgiftcard(item_no, item_name, item_type, item_price, item_size, item_info, image_uuid, cinema_name) VALUES (item_seq.nextval, #{itemName}, #{itemType}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemSize}, #{itemInfo}, #{imageUuid}, #{cinemaName})
mapper.update: update itemgiftcard set item_type = #{itemType}, item_price = #{itemPrice}, item_size = #{itemSize}, item_info = #{itemInfo}, cinema_name = #{cinemaName}, image_uuid = #{imageUuid} where item_name = #{itemName}
mapper.select: SELECT a.* from (SELECT a.*, rownum rn from ( SELECT * from itemgiftcard order by item_no desc) a where rownum <= #{end} ) a where rn >= #{start}
SELECT count(*) FROM itemgiftcard where item_name = #{itemName}
